wikitext.*:
A '''Seer''', or '''Prophet''', was one gifted with extreme [[foresight]]. While many [[Eldar]] and [[Edain]] had foresight, the seers predicted important events far in the future: 

* [[Agaldor]], who foresaw the coming of the [[Númenóreans]] and the salvation of [[Men|Man]].<ref>{{LR|P1III3}}, pp. 86-87</ref>
* [[Amnon]] who predicted the [[Fall of Gondolin]].<ref>{{LT2|III}}, p. 172</ref>
* [[Glirhuin]] of the [[First Age]], who predicted that the [[Stone of the Hapless]] would never be defiled or sink beneath the sea.<ref>{{S|Doriath}}</ref>
* [[Malbeth]] of the mid-[[Third Age]], who predicted that [[Arvedui]] would be the last king of [[Arthedain]]<ref>{{App|Gondor}}</ref> and also foresaw the fate of the [[Dead Men|People of the Dead]].<ref>{{RK|V2}}, ''[[Over the land there lies a long shadow]]''</ref>
